name: No Squares Allowed
description:
Made for the Completion Game Jam in 72 hours.

Browser version may not work if so download the Windows zipped file.

Sound from Jonas Tyroller's wowie resources and Brackeys' 2d mega pack.

How to Play:

Use the ASWD keys or the ARROW keys to move.

Use the SPACE bar to shoot.

Objective:

Work hard to shoot all out of place squares without running out of bullets.

Known Glitches:

Smoke Particle effect and some sound effects randomly stops working. (Including normal shot sound)
